originalTitle: Chad shuts border with Sudan in bid to stop conflict spreading
title: Chad shuts border with Sudan in bid to stop conflict spreading
content: A Chadian government spokesperson says the decision is aimed at protecting citizens.

originalTitle: Robert Mugabe's son charged with attempted murder in South Africa
title: Robert Mugabe's son charged with attempted murder in South Africa
content: Bellarmine Mugabe and one other man have not commented on the charges after a 23-year-old was shot.

originalTitle: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
title: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
content: Sudan accuses Uganda of flouting international law by meeting Rapid Support Forces boss Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo.

originalTitle: Are the US and Iran moving closer to war?
title: Are the US and Iran moving closer to war?
content: Diplomacy continues despite the significant United States military build-up.

originalTitle: Slovakia halts emergency power supplies to Ukraine over Russian oil dispute
title: Slovakia halts emergency power supplies to Ukraine over Russian oil dispute
content: Slovakia had issued a two-day ultimatum to Ukraine to reopen the Soviet-era Druzhba pipeline.

originalTitle: Trump’s new tariff threats trigger economic uncertainty; trade deals stall
title: Trump’s new tariff threats trigger economic uncertainty; trade deals stall
content: The White House is set to impose a 15 percent tariff through Section 122 after the US Supreme Court ruled against Trump.

originalTitle: Four years into its full-scale war in Ukraine, Russia is feeling the effects
title: Four years into its full-scale war in Ukraine, Russia is feeling the effects
content: Steve Rosenberg reports on the economic consequences of Russia's war, and how people are coping.

originalTitle: Ukraine negotiator tells BBC how it feels to sit across table from Russia
title: Ukraine negotiator tells BBC how it feels to sit across table from Russia
content: Sergiy Kyslytsya is among those trying to negotiate an end to the conflict, which is entering its fifth year.

originalTitle: Cartel henchmen unleash violence after top drug lord killed in Mexico
title: Cartel henchmen unleash violence after top drug lord killed in Mexico
content: The death of the most-wanted Jalisco cartel chief sparks retaliatory violence in at least a dozen states in Mexico.

originalTitle: Benfica's Prestianni gets provisional one-match ban after Vinicius incident
title: Benfica's Prestianni gets provisional one-match ban after Vinicius incident
content: Benfica's Gianluca Prestianni receives a provisional one-match Uefa suspension after Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr reported alleged racist abuse during last week's Champions League meeting.

title: Police investigate 'abhorrent' racist abuse of players
content: Police confirm they are investigating after four Premier League players were targeted by online racial abuse at the weekend.

title: What could Mexico cartel violence mean for World Cup?
content: BBC Sport explores the unfolding security situation in Mexico and the potential impact on this summer's World Cup.
